description.value:
A horn of exorcism is an instrument made from an animal horn, or an object of the same shape from carved wood or ivory.

Activate—Rattle the Dead 1 (auditory, manipulate)

Frequency once per hour

Effect Blowing into the horn frightens ghosts and evil spirits who can hear its call. Make an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] against all creatures with the undead or unholy trait in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. This can affect even a mindless creature with that trait, and you don't take a penalty when you attempt to Demoralize a creature that doesn't understand your language.

Activate—Sacred Seeds 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You fill the horn with sacred seeds and then scatter them around you with a twist of your wrist. The horn grants you and your allies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] the ghost touch property rune on all of your weapon and unarmed Strikes for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Horn of Exorcism (Sacred Seeds)]
